data.comment: The match is underway in Hartford.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Free kick for New York in the half of Toronto.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
New York push upfield but Guido Gonzales Jr quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
Throw-in for New York at Rentschler Field.
Throw-in Toronto.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Toronto in the half of New York.
Alejandro Pozuelo for Toronto drives towards goal at Rentschler Field. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
In Hartford, New York push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to New York.
In the minute 11, Toronto have a goal kick.
New York have a dangerous throw-in.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 13, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a New York throw-in in Toronto's half.
New York have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
New York are coming forward and Tom Barlow gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 14, Guido Gonzales Jr awards Toronto a goal kick.
Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Toronto.
Penalty! Guido Gonzales Jr points to the spot, great chance for Toronto...
Dru Yearwood (New York) has received a yellow card from Guido Gonzales Jr.
In the minute 23, Goal! Toronto take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Alejandro Pozuelo spot-kick..
New York to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
In the minute 24, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hartford.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 27, Guido Gonzales Jr awards the home team a throw-in.
Toronto to take a throw-in in New York territory.
New York's Florian Valot gets in a shot on goal at Rentschler Field. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 30, New York have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Throw-in for New York in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a New York throw-in in Toronto's half.
New York advance rapidly upfield but Guido Gonzales Jr blows for offside.
New York have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
In the minute 34, Free kick New York.
Toronto needs to be cautious. New York have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for New York in the half of Toronto.
In the minute 35, Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Throw-in New York.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Toronto to take a throw-in in New York territory.
New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a throw-in for Toronto, close to New York's area.
Throw-in high up the field for New York in Hartford.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to New York.
Throw-in for Toronto in the half of New York.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Hartford.
The second-half has started.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards Toronto a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a New York throw-in in Toronto's half.
In the minute 49, Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
Jared Stroud for New York gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 51, Guido Gonzales Jr awards the home team a throw-in.
New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Toronto throw-in in New York's half.
In the minute 52, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Toronto.
Marc Rzatkowski (New York) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 53, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Toronto pushes forward through Alejandro Pozuelo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Toronto's Pablo Piatti has been booked in Hartford.
In the minute 54, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for New York close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Toronto.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 56, In Hartford New York drive forward through Tom Barlow. His shot is on target but it's saved.
New York have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Goal kick for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
In the minute 59, Guido Gonzales Jr awards the home team a throw-in.
Bradley Carnell is making the team's first substitution at Rentschler Field with Daniel Royer replacing Brian White.
New York make their second substitution with Caden Clark replacing Jared Stroud.
In the minute 60, Free kick for New York in their own half.
Ayo Akinola (Toronto) gets a yellow card.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Important block from the New York defence as Ayo Akinola fires in a strike for Toronto.
New York to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
New York's Florian Valot breaks free at Rentschler Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hartford.
Daniel Royer (New York) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Hartford a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 64, Toronto have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
Toronto are pushing forward but Ayo Akinola's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
In the minute 67, The home team have replaced Pablo Piatti with Tsubasa Endoh. This is the first substitution made today by Greg Vanney.
Samuel Tetteh is on a sub for Tom Barlow for New York.
Throw-in for New York close to the penalty box.
In the minute 70, Free kick Toronto.
At Rentschler Field, Amro Tarek has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal kick for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
In the minute 72, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
In the minute 74, Richie Laryea of Toronto gets in a strike, but is off target.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards New York a goal kick.
Can New York capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toronto's half?
In the minute 75, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for New York in the half of Toronto.
In the minute 76, Toronto’s Richie Laryea is on his feet again at Rentschler Field.
Attention is being given to Toronto’s Richie Laryea and play has been suspended briefly.
Caden Clark gets an equalizer for New York. The score is now 1-1.
Marc Rzatkowski with an assist there.
In the minute 79, Guido Gonzales Jr blows against Toronto's Ayo Akinola for offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
New York's Marc Rzatkowski gets in a shot on goal at Rentschler Field. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 82, New York have a goal kick.
Bradley Carnell (New York) is making a fourth substitution, with Sean Davis replacing Marc Rzatkowski.
The home team replace Nick DeLeon with Patrick Mullins.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for New York in their own half.
Ayo Akinola of Toronto smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Hartford a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for New York in the half of Toronto.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Toronto to take a throw-in in New York territory.
In the minute 87, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Toronto.
Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 88, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a throw-in for Toronto, close to New York's area.
Toronto drives forward and Marky Delgado gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a New York throw-in in Toronto's half.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
